pkgmetadata.longdescription: sphinxcontrib-log-cabinet=========================Organize changelogs generated by ``versionadded``, ``versionchanged``,``deprecated`` directives. The log will be sorted by newest to oldestversion. For HTML docs, older versions will be collapsed by default.Install:.. code-block:: text $ pip install sphinxcontrib-log-cabinetEnable:.. code-block:: python extensions = [ ..., "sphinxcontrib.log_cabinet", ..., ]Configure:``log_cabinet_collapse_all`` By default, current changes and deprecations are not collapsed. Set this to ``True`` to collapse all changes.
